languages.text: "Я выдвигаю гипотезу, что еретики сделали благословенного Амарната участником некоего осквернительного ритуала. Через святотатственное терзание они пытаются сломить его волю и обратить его в нечестивый терминал, управляющий системой внешнего энергетического контура реактора".

"I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."
languages.original_text: "Я выдвигаю гипотезу, что еретики сделали благословенного Амарната участником некоего осквернительного ритуала. Через святотатственное терзание они пытаются сломить его волю и обратить его в нечестивый терминал, управляющий системой внешнего энергетического контура реактора".

traits.locale_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

languages.text: "Mutmaßlich haben die Ketzer den gesegneten Amarnat zum Teilnehmer eines frevlerischen Rituals gemacht. Durch frevelhafte Folter wollen sie seinen Willen brechen und ihn zu einem unheiligen Terminal machen, mit dessen Hilfe sie das externe Energiekreissystem des Reaktors kontrollieren können."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: "Mutmaßlich haben die Ketzer den gesegneten Amarnat zum Teilnehmer eines frevlerischen Rituals gemacht. Durch frevelhafte Folter wollen sie seinen Willen brechen und ihn zu einem unheiligen Terminal machen, mit dessen Hilfe sie das externe Energiekreissystem des Reaktors kontrollieren können."

languages.text: « Je soupçonne les hérétiques d'avoir obligé Amarnat le béni à se livrer à un rituel sacrilège. Par cette torture impie, ils tentent de briser sa volonté pour en faire un terminal hérétique leur permettant de contrôler le circuit d'alimentation extérieur du réacteur. »
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: « Je soupçonne les hérétiques d'avoir obligé Amarnat le béni à se livrer à un rituel sacrilège. Par cette torture impie, ils tentent de briser sa volonté pour en faire un terminal hérétique leur permettant de contrôler le circuit d'alimentation extérieur du réacteur. »

languages.text: “我猜想，这些异端分子强迫蒙福者阿玛纳特参与了某种亵渎仪式。他们试图通过污秽的折磨来腐化他的意志，将他变成邪恶的终端，用来控制反应堆的外部电路系统。”
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: “我猜想，这些异端分子强迫蒙福者阿玛纳特参与了某种亵渎仪式。他们试图通过污秽的折磨来腐化他的意志，将他变成邪恶的终端，用来控制反应堆的外部电路系统。”

languages.text: 「自分の仮定は、異端者が祝福されたアマルナトをあれこれと冒涜的な儀式に巻き込んだというものです。罰当たりな拷問をすることで、奴らは彼の意志を破壊してリアクターの外側の電力回路システムを制御する不浄の装置に変えようとしているのです」
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仮定では、異端者が祝福されたアマルナトをあれこれと冒涜的な儀式に巻き込んだのだろう。罰当たりな拷問をすることで、奴らは彼の意志を破壊して、リアクターの外側の電力回路システムを制御する不浄の装置に変えようとしているのだ」

languages.text: «Mi hipótesis es que los herejes han hecho partícipe al bendito Amarnat de alguna especie de ritual sacrílego. Mediante una tortura sacrílega, intentan doblegar su voluntad y convertirlo en un terminal impío con el que controlar el sistema de circuitos de energía exterior del reactor».
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: «Mi hipótesis es que los herejes han hecho partícipe al bendito Amarnat de alguna especie de ritual sacrílego. Mediante una tortura sacrílega, intentan doblegar su voluntad y convertirlo en un terminal impío con el que controlar el sistema de circuitos de energía exterior del reactor».

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin, kutsanmış Amarnat'ı kutsalı ayaklar altına alan bir ayinin bir parçası olarak kullandıklarını varsayıyorum. Hürmetsizlik saçan işkencelerle iradesini kırmaya ve onu, reaktörün dış güç devresi sistemini kontrol edebilecekleri habis bir terminale çevirmeye çalışıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the heretics have made the blessed Amarnat a participant in some variety of sacrilegious ritual. Through sacrilegious torture, they are trying to break his will and turn him into an unholy terminal with which to control the reactor's outer power circuit system."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin, kutsanmış Amarnat'ı bu günahkâr ayinin bir parçası olarak kullandıklarını varsayıyorum. Küfür niteliğindeki işkencelerle iradesini kırmaya ve onu, reaktörün dış güç devresi sistemini kontrol edebilecekleri habis bir bağlantı noktasına dönüştürmeye çalışıyorlar."
